document_data.name: ''Feytouched Armor''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Feytouched armor''''' was a type of [[item enchantment|enchanted]] [[armor]] that had materials from the [[Feywild]] worked into it. They offered a level of protection comparable to that of [[hide armor|hide]] or [[leather armor]].
document_data.Powers: Those who wore ''feytouched armor'' had enhanced reflexes and could make themselves [[invisibility|invisible]] for brief periods.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Voldini]], a [[baelnorn lich]], owned a suit of ''feytouched armor''.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Twilight Ambitions|24}}
